qa.name: Elias
qa.appearance: Middle-aged, well-dressed, with piercing blue eyes

hf.name: Sarah
hf.essence: Nervous businesswoman with a hidden past

tr.name: Marcus
tr.clothing: Casual jeans and a leather jacket

xc.name: Olivia
xc.essence: Aspiring actress with a dark secret
xc.appearance: Young and attractive, but with a haunted look

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the confined space of a train car, secrets have nowhere to hide.
json_to_edit.description: A mysterious stranger on a night train seems to know the deepest secrets of his fellow passengers.
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with occasional flashes from passing lights
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Train wheels on tracks, distant whistle, muffled conversations
json_to_edit.name: Secrets on Rails
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Elias, a mysterious stranger, unsettles his fellow passengers by revealing he knows their hidden secrets.

qa.action: The interior of a dimly lit train car, showing various passengers seated.

hf.action: Elias walks down the aisle, scanning the faces of the passengers.

tr.action: Sarah's eyes widen as Elias sits across from her and smiles knowingly.

xc.action: Elias leans towards Sarah, whispering something that makes her visibly pale.

ka.action: Marcus and Olivia watch the interaction between Elias and Sarah with growing unease.

fn.action: Elias pulls out a small notebook, flipping through pages filled with scribbled secrets.

af.action: The four characters exchange worried glances as Elias smiles enigmatically at each of them.

edit_command: Remove every second shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will remove every second shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements of the json unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "hf", "xc", and "fn", leaving shots "qa", "tr", "ka", and "af". we'll update the list_display_order accordingly. the number_of_shots will be reduced from 7 to 4. all other information in the json will remain the same.
